gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Kings 121, Trail Blazers 82
gameRecap.excerpt: The Kings defeated the Trail Blazers, 121-82. De’Aaron Fox led the way for the Kings with 24 points, three assists and three steals, while Domantas Sabonis added 18 points, 11 rebounds and nine assists in the victory, his 77th double-double of the season. Duop Reath tallied 14 points and six rebounds for the Trail Blazers in the losing effort. The Kings snap a three-game losing streak as they finish the regular season at 46-36, while the Trail Blazers finish 21-61.
